item.title: Trends in Computing (2011)
item.author: rik.blok@ubc.ca (Rik Blok)
item.description: Years ago I heard it said that computers were doubling in performance every year or two; that is, two years from now you could buy a computer twice as powerful/fast as today for the same price or less. I was curious to see if this was true so I started tracking the prices of individual components on a monthly basis.
